title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, including the target audience, learning objectives, machine learning concepts to cover, and desired features.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the frontend interface, backend services, data storage solutions, and infrastructure setup. Consider scalability, performance, security, and maintainability aspects.

title: Develop Frontend
description: Implement the user interface for the interactive coding environment, including code editors, visualization tools, and user authentication.

title: Develop Backend
description: Implement the backend services for executing and evaluating machine learning code, managing data sets, and handling user submissions.

title: Set up Data Storage
description: Design and implement the data storage solution for storing and retrieving machine learning data sets and user submissions.

title: Develop Machine Learning Exercises
description: Create a collection of coding exercises and real-world data sets covering various machine learning concepts and techniques.

title: Implement Testing and Continuous Integration
description: Set up automated testing frameworks and continuous integration pipelines for the frontend, backend, and machine learning components.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures to protect user data and prevent unauthorized access or misuse of the system.

title: Deploy and Monitor System
description: Set up the deployment infrastructure and monitoring tools for the production environment.

title: Conduct User Testing and Feedback
description: Organize user testing sessions and gather feedback from the target audience to improve the learning experience and usability.
